mapper.select: SELECT a.achievement_id, a.title, a.description, a.achievement_type, a.achievement_value, a.icon_url, a.reward_gallery_id, a.npc_id, IF(ua.achieved_at IS NOT NULL, true, false) as is_achieved, ua.achieved_at, IFNULL(ua.current_value, 0) as current_value FROM achievement a LEFT JOIN user_achievement ua ON a.achievement_id = ua.achievement_id AND ua.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY a.achievement_id ASC

SELECT a.achievement_id, a.title, a.description, a.achievement_type, a.achievement_value, a.icon_url, a.reward_gallery_id, a.npc_id, IF(ua.achieved_at IS NOT NULL, true, false) as is_achieved, ua.achieved_at, IFNULL(ua.current_value, 0) as current_value FROM achievement a LEFT JOIN user_achievement ua ON a.achievement_id = ua.achievement_id AND ua.user_id = #{userId} WHERE a.achievement_id = #{achievementId}
SELECT * FROM user_achievement WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND achievement_id = #{achievementId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_achievement (user_id, achievement_id, current_value, achieved_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{achievementId}, #{currentValue}, #{achievedAt})
